meanings.definition: The arrangement or design of a document or file.
meanings.sent1: Proper formatting makes the document look neat and organized.
meanings.sent2: I need to work on the formatting of my essay before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The formatting of the report was so messy, it looked like a jumbled puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic formatting of the presentation turned it into a visual masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The formatting of the spreadsheet made it easy to read and understand.

meanings.definition: The process of preparing a storage medium for reading and writing data.
meanings.sent1: Before saving the file, make sure the formatting of the USB drive is correct.
meanings.sent2: The formatting of the hard drive erased all the data stored on it.
meanings.sent3: The formatting of the memory card was like giving it a fresh start.
meanings.sent4: The formatting of the external hard drive was like clearing its mind for new information.
meanings.sent5: Proper formatting of the disk ensures smooth data transfer.

meanings.definition: The act of organizing or structuring information in a specific way.
meanings.sent1: Effective formatting of the report made it easier to follow the key points.
meanings.sent2: The formatting of the website's content was user-friendly and intuitive.
meanings.sent3: The formatting of the email made it look like a well-organized to-do list.
meanings.sent4: Her unique formatting of the data brought out hidden patterns and insights.
meanings.sent5: The formatting of the textbook helped students grasp the material better.
